name: Sakura Sunshine
description:
• Rei is having trouble brainstorming ideas for her manga, and is in need of a grand adventure to help inspire her...
  • Join Rei and her pet cat, Koneko, as they explore their beautiful surroundings within Japan. Encounter cute creatures inside Rei's imagination, such as baby birds and goats, or even bonsai trees and rain clouds!
  • Four chapters of unique gameplay await, each with charming landscapes and adorable critters. Every piece of this tale contains secrets to uncover: cutesy new enemies, traps, power-ups, and challenging bosses!
  • With three levels of difficulty, novices and experts alike will find their perfect challenge. Test your abilities further by beating your high-scores in Time Mode!
